scripts.version:patch: npm run version:pre && npm version patch && npm run version:post
scripts.version:minor: npm run version:pre && npm version minor && npm run version:post
scripts.version:major: npm run version:pre && npm version major && npm run version:post
scripts.version:pre: if [ $(git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD) != 'main' ]; then echo "\033[1m\033[31mCurrently on $(git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD) branch. Please checkout main.\033[0m"; exit 1; else exit 0; fi
scripts.version:post: git push origin main && git push origin main --tags
scripts.build-release:patch: react-scripts test --watchAll=false && npm run build && npm run version:patch
scripts.build-release:minor: react-scripts test --watchAll=false && npm run build && npm run version:minor
scripts.build-release:major: react-scripts test --watchAll=false && npm run build && npm run version:major
